## Configuration

If you happen to use Debian Linux (KDE), which is my wife's least disliked Linux distro, you may use the command below to configure the entire workspace:

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
bash <(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chenh19/MyWorkspace/main/setup.sh)
```

If you use other Unix/Linux systems, you may use the commands below to configure your system:

- Connecting to GitHub with SSH:

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
bash <(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chenh19/git_ssh/main/gitssh.sh)
```

- Setting up alternative ```rm``` command:
```{bash, eval=FALSE}
bash <(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chenh19/alt_rm/main/install.sh)
```
